channel.title: Cisco on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in Cisco on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Cisco UCS Custom Resource for the Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC)
item.description: The Cisco UCS PowerTool Suite is a set of PowerShell modules for Cisco UCS Manager, Cisco IMC (C-Series stand-alone servers) and Cisco UCS Central that helps in configuration and management of Cisco UCS domains and solutions.
